casebody.data:
Parris, Respondent, v. Village of Green Island, Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. September 25, 1891.) Action by Jeffrey Parris against the village of Green Island.

Argued before Learned, P. J., and Landon and Mayham, JJ.

No opinion. Motion to amend denied. For opinion on appeal, see 14 N. Y. Supp. 703.
